SALES ANALYSIS ----

The following is the code to analyze the bike sales based on different location and based on year.

# Loading necessary libraries ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_d2062e7c601fb1c9b651e6d89429af70'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```
:::


# Importing Files ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_c737d44e85305ac0eeaf070ac5b6ecea'}

```{.r .cell-code}
bikes_tbl <- read_excel("content/00_raw_data/01_bike_sales/01_raw_data/bikes.xlsx")

bikeshops_tbl <- read_excel("content/00_raw_data/01_bike_sales/01_raw_data/bikeshops.xlsx")

orderlines_tbl <- read_excel("content/00_raw_data/01_bike_sales/01_raw_data/orderlines.xlsx")
```
:::


# Examining Data ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_424264da41d075f8bb36415c0f3b4d3e'}

```{.r .cell-code}
bikes_tbl %>% glimpse()
bikeshops_tbl %>% glimpse()
orderlines_tbl %>% glimpse()
```
:::


# Joining Data ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_cf2d996eeb075b06803719107f85234a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_orderlines_joined_tbl <- orderlines_tbl %>%
        left_join(bikes_tbl, by = c("product.id" = "bike.id")) %>%
        left_join(bikeshops_tbl, by = c("customer.id" = "bikeshop.id"))

bike_orderlines_joined_tbl %>% glimpse()
```
:::


# Wrangling Data ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_3103f3386faf1e01b63957b3a6d76101'}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_orderlines_wrangled_tbl <- bike_orderlines_joined_tbl %>%
  separate(col    = location,
           into   = c("city", "state"),
           sep    = ",") %>%
  mutate(total.price = price * quantity) %>%
  select(-...1, -gender) %>%
  select(-ends_with(".id")) %>%
  bind_cols(bike_orderlines_joined_tbl %>% select(order.id)) %>% 
  select(order.id, contains("order"), contains("model"), contains("location"),
         price, quantity, total.price,
         everything()) %>%
  rename(bikeshop = name) %>%
  set_names(names(.) %>% str_replace_all("\\.", "_"))
```
:::


# Business Insights ----

## Sales by Location ----

### Step 1 - Manipulate


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_52214813fa50751bf664536edd7ddaa3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sales_by_loc_tbl <- bike_orderlines_wrangled_tbl %>%
group_by(state) %>% 
summarize(sales = sum(total_price)) %>%
mutate(revenue = scales::dollar(sales, big.mark = ".", 
                                     decimal.mark = ",", 
                                     prefix = "", 
                                     suffix = " €"))

sales_by_loc_tbl
```
:::


### Step 2 - Visualize


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_b40610d7f8f9c48c1455bbbf59407b0a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sales_by_loc_plot <- sales_by_loc_tbl %>%
ggplot(aes(x = state, y = sales)) +
geom_col(fill = "#2DC6D6") + 
geom_label(aes(label = revenue)) + 
scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format(big.mark = ".", 
                                                    decimal.mark = ",", 
                                                    prefix = "", 
                                                    suffix = " €")) +
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))+                 labs(
    title    = "Revenue by State",
    x = "", # Override defaults for x and y
    y = "Revenue"
  )
```
:::


## Sales by State and Year ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_aa91239124fb5d319c13e88e55778259'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(lubridate)
```
:::


### Step 1 - Manipulate


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_5b81b3d83df771a3ba7d0e19da70e0c9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sales_by_year_tbl <- bike_orderlines_wrangled_tbl %>%
select(state, order_date, total_price) %>%
mutate(year = year(order_date)) %>%
group_by(state, year) %>% 
summarize(sales = sum(total_price)) %>%
mutate(sales_text = scales::dollar(sales, big.mark = ".", 
                                     decimal.mark = ",", 
                                     prefix = "", 
                                     suffix = " €"))
sales_by_year_tbl
```
:::


### Step 2 - Visualize


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_c72b0b2b83583e4463ef29cafe3a5dbd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sales_by_year_plot <- sales_by_year_tbl %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = sales, fill = state)) +
  geom_col() + # Run up to here to get a stacked bar plot
  facet_wrap(~ state) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format(big.mark = ".", 
                                                    decimal.mark = ",", 
                                                    prefix = "", 
                                                    suffix = " €")) +
  labs(
    title = "Revenue by Year and State",
    fill = "States" 
  )
```
:::


# Writing Files ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_f0310143353f196df830b193a30923dc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(writexl)
```
:::


## Excel ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_de89958e8fbff4c73f3998971586c0bf'}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_orderlines_wrangled_tbl %>% 
write_xlsx("00_raw_data/01_bike_sales/02_wrangled_data/bike_orderlines.xlsx")
```
:::


## CSV ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_aef7e5d9b9cb9e24c9dcd04e8bc97024'}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_orderlines_wrangled_tbl %>% 
write_csv("00_raw_data/01_bike_sales/02_wrangled_data/bike_orderlines.csv")
```
:::


## RDS ----


::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_ba4e0888fb7b2936b60d58f3e1e44e78'}

